text: Our latest study on post-bariatric hypoglycemia published in JAMA. 127 patients post-RYGB evaluated for PBH symptoms. 34% presented with severe hypoglycemic episodes <50mg/dL. Acarbose showed 67% efficacy in symptom reduction. Novel GLP-1 antagonist therapies showing promise. Link to full paper: [redacted] #BariatricResearch #Endocrinology
